upgrades.name: Ice Shield
upgrades.description: Temporary protection from one hit of damage.
upgrades.effect: Creates a protective ice barrier around the penguin.

upgrades.name: Double Jump
upgrades.effect: Press jump again while in the air to perform a second jump.

upgrades.name: Speed Boost
upgrades.effect: Makes the penguin move 50% faster for 10 seconds.

upgrades.name: Ice Slide
upgrades.effect: Slide faster and further on ice surfaces.

upgrades.name: Fish Magnet
upgrades.effect: Automatically collects fish within a certain radius.

upgrades.name: Time Freeze
upgrades.effect: Slows down all moving objects for 5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Ice Platform
upgrades.effect: Summons a small ice platform that lasts for 3 seconds.
